00024 AlgorithmState* AlgorithmState::state(NULL);

00026 bool resetButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00027 {
00028     AlgorithmState::get()->reset();
00029     return true;
00030 }
00031 
00032 bool calculateButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00033 {
00034     if (AlgorithmState::get()->canConvert())
00035     {
00036         AlgorithmState::get()->performConversion();
00037         GuiManager::get()->getCheckbox("editBox")->setSelected(false);
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00041 bool quitButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00042 {
00043     SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00044     return true;
00045 }

00047 AlgorithmState::AlgorithmState() : mouseDown(false)
00048 {
00049     runner = new AlgorithmRunner();
00050 }
00051 
00052 AlgorithmState::~AlgorithmState()
00053 {
00054     delete runner;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void AlgorithmState::reset()
00058 {
00059     outline->clearPoints();
00060     triangles1->clearTriangles();
00061     triangles2->clearTriangles();
00062 }
00063 
00064 void AlgorithmState::performConversion()
00065 {
00066     runner->convertShape(outline, triangles1, triangles2);
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool AlgorithmState::canConvert()
00070 {
00071     return outline->isConvertable();
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool AlgorithmState::mouseInsideWindow()
00075 {
00076     hgeVector mousePosition = InputManager::get()->getMousePosition();
00077     if (GuiManager::get()->getWindow("controlWindow")->isHit(Vector2(mousePosition.x, mousePosition.y)))
00078         return true;
00079     else
00080         return false;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void AlgorithmState::createScene()
00084 {
00085     GuiManager* gui = GuiManager::get();
00086     gui->loadLayout("..\\resources\\gui\\layouts\\algorithm.layout");
00087     gui->getButton("resetButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&resetButtonPushed));
00088     gui->getButton("calculateButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&calculateButtonPushed));
00089     gui->getButton("quitButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&quitButtonPushed));
00090 
00091     ScriptManager::get()->loadResourceScript("../resources/data/fonts.res");
00092 
00093     outline = new PointShape();
00094     triangles1 = new TriangleShape("Triangles 1");
00095     triangles1->hide();
00096     triangles2 = new TriangleShape("Triangles 2");
00097 
00098     outline->addPoint(hgeVector(-100, 100));
00099     outline->addPoint(hgeVector(0, 0));
00100     outline->addPoint(hgeVector(100, 100));
00101     outline->addPoint(hgeVector(125, -100));
00102     outline->addPoint(hgeVector(-125, -100));
00103     outline->finalize();
00104 }
00105 
00106 void AlgorithmState::clear()
00107 {
00108     delete outline;
00109     delete triangles1;
00110     delete triangles2;
00111 }

00113 void AlgorithmState::FrameFunc()
00114 {
00115     if (GuiManager::get()->getCheckbox("originalOutput")->isSelected())
00116         triangles1->show();
00117     else
00118         triangles1->hide();
00119 
00120     if (GuiManager::get()->getCheckbox("optomizedOutput")->isSelected())
00121         triangles2->show();
00122     else
00123         triangles2->hide();
00124 
00125     if (InputManager::get()->getKeyState(HGEK_LBUTTON) && !mouseDown && GuiManager::get()->getCheckbox("editBox")->isSelected()
00126         && !outline->isConvertable() && !mouseInsideWindow())
00127     {
00128         mouseDown = true;
00129         hgeVector mousePosition = InputManager::get()->getMousePosition();
00130         mousePosition.x -= 400;
00131         mousePosition.y -= 300;
00132         mousePosition.y *= -1;
00133 
00134         CyclicVector<hgeVector> points = outline->getPoints();
00135 
00136         Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00137 
00138         if (points.size() > 0)
00139         {
00140             bool valid = true;
00141             for (int i = 1; i < points.size(); ++i)
00142             {
00143                 if (utils->distanceBetween(mousePosition, points[i]) < 20)
00144                 {
00145                     valid = false;
00146                     break;
00147                 }
00148             }
00149 
00150             if (valid)
00151             {
00152                 if (utils->distanceBetween(mousePosition, points[0]) < 20)
00153                     outline->finalize();
00154                 else
00155                     outline->addPoint(mousePosition);
00156             }
00157         }
00158         else
00159             outline->addPoint(mousePosition);
00160     }
00161     else if (!InputManager::get()->getKeyState(HGEK_LBUTTON))
00162         mouseDown = false;
00163 }
